statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_permissions;
SELECT id, username, permission_level FROM user_access_permissions WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, role FROM user_access_permissions WHERE username LIKE 'user%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT username, role, permission_level FROM user_access_permissions WHERE role = 'editor' AND permission_level >= 3;
SELECT id, username, role, permission_level FROM user_access_permissions WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_access_permissions WHERE role = 'manager' ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT id, role, permission_level FROM user_access_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_access_permissions WHERE permission_level >= 3;
SELECT username, role FROM user_access_permissions WHERE role IN ('admin', 'manager') AND permission_level < 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name = 'read';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id < 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%test%' ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' AND password = 'admin123';
SELECT role_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'User' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, COUNT(p.permission_name) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id GROUP BY u.username, r.role_name ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%a%' AND r.role_name = 'Manager';
